name: Wormwood
description: Wormwood is a multifunctional natural cream for people with osteoarthritis, arthritis or bone deterioration that makes movement difficult. Wormwood reduces inflammation, strengthens joints and prevents the problem from getting worse.
benefits: Say goodbye to pain! - Relieves discomfort in joints and muscles so you can enjoy everyday without aches and stiffness
Get your mobility back - Forget about stiffness and move freely with ease and comfort
Advanced formula with premium ingredients - Shark liver oil, vitamin D3, collagen, saffron, solitary living, absinthin, resins, log and, flavonoids, phenolic acids and photochemicals
